name: Athletic Box
description:
Athletic Box is a funny casual game. Don't touch the red obstacles. You can use both the top and bottom of the line. You can also jump. Swipe up or down in order to control the athlete. While playing the game on your computer, don't forget to keep the left mouse button pressed when swiping up or down. Go as far as you can without touching any obstacles.

WEBSITE: https://retoxin.com

YOUTUBE: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC4I-_eb73BcRHfC7XiWUDjw?view_as=subscriber
